meanings.definition: Corn kernels that have been heated until they burst open and become fluffy.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The popcorn at the movie theater always smells delicious.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as the popcorn popped in the microwave.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas burst like popcorn kernels in a hot pan.
meanings.sent5: The popcorn machine hummed, filling the room with a tempting aroma.
